MAN.TITLE: TCL_DeleteInterp

PARAM_DESCRIPTION.SP: : character string parameter. Name of the slave tcl interpreter to delete. If not provided, it defaults to the main tcl interpreter created by Scilab.

DESCRIPTION.P: This routine allows to delete a TCL slave interpreter or the main scilab TCL interpreter.

MAN.EXAMPLE: TCL_SetVar("Scilab","OK") TCL_ExistVar("Scilab") TCL_DeleteInterp() TCL_ExistVar("Scilab") TCL_CreateSlave('BisInterp') TCL_ExistInterp('BisInterp') TCL_SetVar("Scilab","OK",'BisInterp') TCL_ExistVar("Scilab",'BisInterp') TCL_DeleteInterp('BisInterp') TCL_ExistInterp('BisInterp')
MAN.AUTHOR: Allan CORNET
